General.Name: Trk Corp
General.Description: TRK Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the operation and management of commercial real estate properties in Taiwan. The company manages shopping mall properties; and operates parent-child amusement park under the Game Love Paradise name. It is also involved in the sports, leisure, and tourism; and security trading businesses. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
